episodes.title: John Wilson: “We were groomed by a cult leader” | The Louis Theroux Podcast
episodes.description:
John Wilson in the house! The brilliant and idiosyncratic documentary auteur discusses filmmaking, his acclaimed HBO series ‘How To with John Wilson’, his run-in with the NXIVM cult, Nathan Fielder, acappella singing, and much else besides. It’s an awkward-man two-hander! Please join!
https://open.spotify.com/episode/72uXTGekyvo0xADdvFQCSg?si=916f8db2a0fa438b

episodes.title: S5 EP4: John Wilson on collaborating with Nathan Fielder, confronting a cult, and hating mockumentaries
episodes.description: Louis speaks to John Wilson, fellow documentarian and creator of the cult-favourite series, How To...with John Wilson. The pair swap stories about their respective work, including discussing John’s collaborations with writer and producer Nathan Fielder, how joining an acapella group exposed him to the NXIVM sex-cult, and their shared disdain for mockumentaries. Plus, John turns the tables on Louis… Warnings: Strong language and some adult themes.
